confidentialityNotice: This communication is confidential and is intended to be privileged pursuant to the privilege and the work-product doctrine. If the reader of this message is not the intended recipient or the employee or agent responsible to deliver it to the intended recipient, you are hereby notified that any dissemination, distribution or copying of this communication is strictly prohibited. If you have received this communication in error, please immediately notify us by telephone, and return the communication via the U.S. Postal Service.
